short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making Helix bar prep a bit easier (Unofficial extension)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you set a default video playback speed that will automatically be selected when viewing recorded lectures in the Helix Bar Review course. There is also an option to automatically start playing videos when the page loads and an option to automatically enable subtitles. The extension also added "skip backwards/forwards" buttons to allow you to move backwards/forwards a few seconds. 

NOTE: This app is not produced or endorsed by Helix.
